author: Universal Pictures
description:

Synopsis:
Andy Stitzer (Steve Carell) has gone 40 years without "doing it." Now his pals are making it their mission to help him score... fast! Can he survive their hilariously bad advice? Will he land in the arms of the way-too-experienced or the way-t
title: "You're a Virgin?! 😳♠️#The40-Year-OldVirgin #Shorts

author: Universal Pictures
description:
Balancing three high-profile roles at NBC, a love for movies, and family time is no small feat.

Craig Melvin, co-anchor of TODAY, co-host of the third hour of TODAY, and host of Dateline NBC, joins Jacqueline Coley to talk about his path in journalism, his passion for film, and life inside 30 Rock.

Craig reflects on the moment he was named co-anchor of TODAY, the surprise his family gave him live on air that became a “core memory,” and why he feels like the mayor of a small town. He also shares how movie nights have become a cherished family tradition, filled with popcorn, laughter, and introducing his kids to classics like Shrek and the Minions in Despicable Me.

From behind-the-scenes Dateline stories to his love of A Few Good Men and Space Jam, Craig offers a candid look at the moments, movies, and memories that shape his work and life.

Follow and listen to Seen on the Screen with Jacqueline Coley wherever you listen to podcasts 🎧
· Apple Podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/
title: Craig Melvin Talks Today Show, Dateline, & Family Movie Nights|Seen on the Screen w/Jacqueline Coley
